data.what_is:
All Your Channels
In One Location
Manage conversations with your customers through Email, SMS, Push Notifications, Pop-Ups Banners, and Net Promoter Score. Design, implement and measure without leaving the platform
data.product_description:
emBlue platform and professional services had helped companies for 18+ years throughout the Americas create trustful & profitable interactions.

emBlue will register all activity of a person who has received an email and will discover his interests and brand's fidelity. We ll use this data to deliver relevant messages and real time content to engage audiences. We. call this Hyper - segmentation.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
Up to 5.000 email conversations.
Includes:
Free online training.
Hundreds of templates are available to build up your messages with incredible designs.
Tech support: email, phone & chat available.

All Plan Free features included.
Unlimited marketing automation.
Creative team: Our experts do along with you up to 1 on demand campaigns (Design Layout HTML) a month.
Data Integration: emBlue assists your integration connectivity.
Tech support: email, phone & chat available.

All Plan Standard features included.
Creative team: Our experts do along with you up to 10 on demand campaigns (Design Layout HTML) a month.
Data Integration: emBlue assists your integration connectivity.
Omnichannel Team: Have a personal advisor on omnichannel strategic planning, execution, deliverability & data base management.
Tech support: Prioritize attention.

All Plan Professional features included.

Creative team: with your Enterprise Plan, you'll have access to 20 campaigns on demand per month (design, layout, and HTML).

Data Integration: emBlue assists your integration connectivity.

Omnichannel Team: Have a personal advisor on omnichannel strategic planning, execution, deliverability & data base management.

I.T. team: emBlue I.T. monitors your campaign guaranteeing best performance possible.

Tech support: Personalized Attention with a dedicated experts team assigned to you.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
The costumer service is absolutely great. Every time I've had doubts about using the platform to it's full potencial, they've had a team ready to answer my questions and help me out.

What do you dislike about emBlue?
My whole experience with the platform has been pretty positive.  There is nothing in particular that I don't like about EmBlue. They are absolutely efficient...

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
EmBlue has tools that help me to reach, keep in touch and approach my costumers as if I was talking personally to each and everyone of them. It also helps me to better understand my clients and anticipate their needs.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: The costumer service is absolutely great. Every time I've had doubts about using the platform to it's full potencial, they've had a team ready to answer my questions and help me out.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: My whole experience with the platform has been pretty positive.  There is nothing in particular that I don't like about EmBlue. They are absolutely efficient...

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: EmBlue has tools that help me to reach, keep in touch and approach my costumers as if I was talking personally to each and everyone of them. It also helps me to better understand my clients and anticipate their needs.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
The pricing and bundling features based on the user/usage count is a boon for many small and mid-sized enterprises. The customer and technical service is a standout from the rest (competitors)

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Lack of integration or sub-optimal integration with day-to-day messaging applications could be a point of intervention. Self service reporting could be developed and enhanced

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Simplifying the mailing, messaging, and notifications to client/prospect teams. Automating the regular mundane jobs. Empowering the marketing and revenue operations team with oversight and reports

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: The pricing and bundling features based on the user/usage count is a boon for many small and mid-sized enterprises. The customer and technical service is a standout from the rest (competitors)

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Lack of integration or sub-optimal integration with day-to-day messaging applications could be a point of intervention. Self service reporting could be developed and enhanced

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Simplifying the mailing, messaging, and notifications to client/prospect teams. Automating the regular mundane jobs. Empowering the marketing and revenue operations team with oversight and reports

initial_reviews.review_title: EmBlue, una plataforma que se adecua a tus necesidades
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
un servicio tecnico agil, que responde a las necesidades del cliente, ademas de brindar un apoyo alineado a las nuevas estrategias que benefician a la compania.

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Una de las opotunidades de mejora que podrian tener, es la implementacion de  mas herramientas que brinden una mejor  segmentacion para conocer mejor a los usuarios que se tienen en las bases de datos.

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
EmBlue es una herramienta que nos ayuda a llevar trafico de calidad al sitio web de la compania , comunicandoles contenido relevante a los usuarios y de esta manera poder fidelizarlos.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: un servicio tecnico agil, que responde a las necesidades del cliente, ademas de brindar un apoyo alineado a las nuevas estrategias que benefician a la compania.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Una de las opotunidades de mejora que podrian tener, es la implementacion de  mas herramientas que brinden una mejor  segmentacion para conocer mejor a los usuarios que se tienen en las bases de datos.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: EmBlue es una herramienta que nos ayuda a llevar trafico de calidad al sitio web de la compania , comunicandoles contenido relevante a los usuarios y de esta manera poder fidelizarlos.

initial_reviews.review_title: Automation Service for ALL categories of clients
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
The team that is with you, not just behind the platform. The versatility of the features for different categories of clients for my agency let me work very agil

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Will love to see more native integrations

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
The team that works with you at the onboarding/kickoff stage helps you to clarify and goes all the way on the integrations we have to do

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: The team that is with you, not just behind the platform. The versatility of the features for different categories of clients for my agency let me work very agil

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Will love to see more native integrations

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The team that works with you at the onboarding/kickoff stage helps you to clarify and goes all the way on the integrations we have to do

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
Tienen respuestas muy rapidas ante cualquier incidencia y la plataforma es muy intuitiva y facil de usar. Son un gran partner estrategico para avanzar en todos nustros desafios ya que nos dan soporte permanentemente.

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Estaria bueno que sumen una instancia mensual de reporting automatico de los envios realizados mensualmente.

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Comunicacion masiva a nustros clientes para que se enteren de todas nuestras novedades instantanemante. Nos ayuda a vender en nuestro ecommerce.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Tienen respuestas muy rapidas ante cualquier incidencia y la plataforma es muy intuitiva y facil de usar. Son un gran partner estrategico para avanzar en todos nustros desafios ya que nos dan soporte permanentemente.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Estaria bueno que sumen una instancia mensual de reporting automatico de los envios realizados mensualmente.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Comunicacion masiva a nustros clientes para que se enteren de todas nuestras novedades instantanemante. Nos ayuda a vender en nuestro ecommerce.

initial_reviews.review_title: emBlue, a powerfull platform and very easy to use it
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
The different  plans offered, so I could choose one without worrying about my budget and the technical support from real people (rather than just from a bot)

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Difficult to tell...  If you have a demo account, you could only use it for 30 days...

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
emBlue is helping me with my automation workflows and campaign designs. It's awesome!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: The different  plans offered, so I could choose one without worrying about my budget and the technical support from real people (rather than just from a bot)

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Difficult to tell...  If you have a demo account, you could only use it for 30 days...

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: emBlue is helping me with my automation workflows and campaign designs. It's awesome!

initial_reviews.review_title: One Stop Shop for Mailing Automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
The platform is very easy to use and provides useful feedback to develop better campaigns.

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Sometimes the UX is slow, when you move between modules.

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ease of communication with users.
Effective segmentation of lists
Creation of relevant audiences to deliver the message.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: The platform is very easy to use and provides useful feedback to develop better campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes the UX is slow, when you move between modules.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Ease of communication with users.
Effective segmentation of lists
Creation of relevant audiences to deliver the message.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great mail automation tool, for big and small clients
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
It brings mailing, SMS, push notifications, banner pop ups, NPS surveys... all in one platform.
I also much appreciate their native Spanish support channel, great for clients in LatAm

What do you dislike about emBlue?
They still lack Whatsapp messaging integration.

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
Professional messaging, ranging from just a few to millions of deliveries, handles outbound and automated inbound communications with clients effectively.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer:
It brings mailing, SMS, push notifications, banner pop ups, NPS surveys... all in one platform.
I also much appreciate their native Spanish support channel, great for clients in LatAm

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: They still lack Whatsapp messaging integration.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Professional messaging, ranging from just a few to millions of deliveries, handles outbound and automated inbound communications with clients effectively.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
Es una plataforma super dinamica y poderosa con sus Flows Automaticos. El area de soporte es muy atento.

What do you dislike about emBlue?
Visualizar los reportes dentro de la plataforma de forma individual es un poco lento el proceso. La mejor forma es generar reportes automaticos

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
La automatizacion de mails

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about emBlue?
What I like the most is the strategic support, the features and all the tools offered by the platform in addition to email marketing

What do you dislike about emBlue?
I haven't found anything that has displeased me so far

Recommendations to others considering emBlue:
I recommend the platform and all the human service behind it, they are excellent professionals who know what they are doing and understand your needs and advise you accordingly.

What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
With emBlue I solve all my activity tracking of my users, the automation tool saves me a lot of time and makes me impact at the right time with my clients and potential clients

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: What I like the most is the strategic support, the features and all the tools offered by the platform in addition to email marketing

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about emBlue?
review_question_answers.answer: I haven't found anything that has displeased me so far

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering emBlue:
review_question_answers.answer: I recommend the platform and all the human service behind it, they are excellent professionals who know what they are doing and understand your needs and advise you accordingly.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is emBlue solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: With emBlue I solve all my activity tracking of my users, the automation tool saves me a lot of time and makes me impact at the right time with my clients and potential clients
